item.title: Nearly 150 protesters marched through the streets of downtown...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Nearly 150 protesters marched through the streets of downtown Denver denouncing both presidential candidates on Thursday, November 5, 2020.

A popular chant throughout the evening was “No borders, no walls, no USA at all!”

The protest was advertised based on a flyer and language from CrimethInc.’s EVERYBODY OUT! Resources for a Season of Post-Election Unrest, which was published prior to election day.

item.title: Abolish ICE Denver+8Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverTonight PSL joined in a car caravan from the GEO Aurora ICE detention center...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver+8Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Tonight PSL joined in a car caravan from the GEO Aurora ICE detention center to the Denver County Jail and Denver Women’s Correctional Facility to say FREE THEM... ALL!

Across the country, millions of people are trapped in ICE detention, jails, and prisons during this deadly global pandemic. Thousands have needlessly died, and hundreds of thousands have been infected. We demand mass humanitarian release NOW! #FreeThemAll

See More
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverColorado People's AllianceThese are the consequences of leaving the health of folks at the hands of a corporation. GEO is...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverColorado People's Alliance

These are the consequences of leaving the health of folks at the hands of a corporation. GEO is not keeping our community safe. We need you to take action today...!
✅ Call ICE and demand the release of everyone at the detention center on humanitarian parole (720) 873-2899
✅Call Warden Johnny Choate and demand that he provides proper medical care for everyone in need (303) 361-6612
✅ Sign-up to be a volunteer for COPA's Detention Lifeline
email raul@coloradopeoplesalliance.org

Estas son las consecuencias de dejar la salud de las personas en manos de una corporación. GEO no mantiene segura a nuestra comunidad. ¡Necesitamos que actúes hoy!

✅ Llama a ICE y exige la liberación de todos en el centro de detención en libertad condicional humanitaria (720) 873-2899
✅Llama al alcaide Johnny Choate y exige que brinde atención médica adecuada a todos los necesitados (303) 361-6612
✅ Regístrate para ser voluntario de la línea salvavidas para detenidos de COPA envia un correo electrónico a raul@coloradopeoplesalliance.org

See More
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverThis live video has ended.November 9 at 4:50 PMCaravan and Vigil - #FreeThemAllThis video is now available to watchWatch...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverThis live video has ended.

November 9 at 4:50 PM

Caravan and Vigil - #FreeThemAllThis video is now available to watchWatch NowColorado People's Alliance was live.

***seguido por español***
#COVID19 threatens the lives of everyone imprisoned, with outbreaks in more than two dozen carceral setting in Colorado right now. We ...know #DetentionIsDeadly and the only safe course of action for people in cages, the workers at those facilities and the #publichealth is to #FreeThemAll.
*** #COVID19 representa una amenaza a toda nuestra gente encarcelada. Colorado se encuentra con brotes en mas de dos docenas en lugares carcelarios ahora mismo. Sabemos que la detención es mortal y que el único curso de acción seguro, tanto para las personas en jaulas, los trabajadores en estos lugares y la #saludpublica es liberarlos a todos.

Immigration and Customs Enforcement’s decision to return to business as usual and the GEO detention center in Aurora are not keeping our community safe. Experts like Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes are calling for compassionate humanitarian release of all imprisoned people. Tonight, we will hear from loved ones of those jailed, impacted individuals and the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado about how your donations can free our people!
***La decisión de la migra de regresar a operativos “normales” conjunto con como GEO maneja su centro de detención, ponen en peligro la seguridad de nuestra comunidad. Expertos como Dr. Carlos Paredes están clamando por una liberación humanitaria de todas las personas encarceladas. ¡Esta noche escucharemos de los seres queridos de la gente aprisionada, de personas detenidas y del Fondo de Liberación de Inmigrantes en Colorado sobre como sus donativos pueden rescatar a nuestra gente!

This event is brought to you by the American Friends Service Committee, the Colorado People’s Alliance, the Colorado Freedom Fund AND the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.
****Este evento es patrocinado por el Comité de Servicio de los Amigos Americanos en Colorado, Colorado People’s Alliance, Colorado Freedom Fund Y TAMBIEN el Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.

See More

item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverWorking Class Heroes

Biden was Vice President when family detention began at the border. He handed over to Trump all of the tools to rampantly terrorize immigrants. Biden must be accountable to the suffering he facilitated and stop family separation & deportations.

item.title: ***sigue en espanol *** With the recent outbreak, COVID 19...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

***sigue en espanol ***
With the recent outbreak, COVID 19 threatens the lives of everyone imprisoned. #DetentionIsDeadly. Immigration and Customs Enforcement’s decision to return to business as usual and its GEO detention center in Aurora are not keeping our community safe, and experts agree, the only answer is to #FreeThemAll. Just last month, Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes called for compassionate humanitarian release of all imprisoned people. Join us Monday, November 9th at 6...:00 pm at 3130 Oakland in Aurora for a Caravan around the detention center and virtually on FB Live. We will hear from family and impacted individuals and from the Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund about how your donations can free our people! This event is brought to you by the American Friends Service Committee, the Colorado People’s Alliance, the Colorado Freedom Fund AND the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.

Con el reciente brote, COVID 19 amenaza la vida de todos los encarcelados. #DetentionIsDeadly. La decisión del Servicio de Inmigración y Control de Aduanas de volver a la normalidad y su centro de detención GEO en Aurora no mantiene a nuestra comunidad segura, y los expertos coinciden en que la única respuesta es #FreeThemAll. El mes pasado, el Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes pidió la liberación humanitaria compasiva de todas las personas encarceladas. Únase a nosotros el lunes 9 de noviembre a las 6:00 pm en 3130 Oakland en Aurora para una caravana alrededor del centro de detención y virtualmente en FB Live. ¡Escucharemos a familiares e individuos afectados y al Fondo de Libertad de Inmigrantes de Colorado sobre cómo sus donaciones pueden liberar a nuestra gente! Este evento es presentado por el American Friends Service Committee, la Colorado People's Alliance, el Colorado Freedom Fund Y el Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund.

See More

MON, NOV 9

November Vigil at GEO

3130 Oakland St, Aurora, CO 80010-1502, United StatesCauses · 332 people

item.title: Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family....
item.content:encoded:
Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family.

A BLM protestor was ran over on their scooter this summer wearing a BLM mask in Denver and many in community feel that it's a major DPD coverup.

Chris was wearing a BLM mask, he tried to get his friends out of harms way and the driver redirected and targeted him, plowing into a group of black kids and killing Chris. All the kids are from out of town and coming back for the DPD press conference Tuesday

Tomorrow we expect police to say they found the car but no driver and DPD may even be closing the investigation b/c the car was supposedly reported stolen before the incident.
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Gaby and Lupe are selling cebiche & Spring Fling Cake this weekend. They’re raising money to pay for legal fees for...
item.content:encoded: Gaby and Lupe are selling cebiche & Spring Fling Cake this weekend. They’re raising money to pay for legal fees for family members, and legal fees are incredibly high. Buy a meal and #KeepFamiliesTogether this weekend. tinyurl.com/solidaritymeals-10-17
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline...
item.content:encoded:
Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline

🚨Community Alert🚨
The Aurora Fire Chief notified council members of a COVID-19 outbreak at the GEO detention facility this afternoon. There are 19 confirmed positive cases! We know we can't count on GEO to keep our community members who are detained safe. We demand that GEO releases as many folks as possible on humanitarian parole and ensures that those who are sick receive the proper medical care! We will keep monitoring the situation and connect with folks inside the facility to ensure their health and safety.

Read our full press release here: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

🚨Alerta a la comunidad🚨
El jefe de bomberos de Aurora notificó a los miembros del consejo sobre un brote de COVID-19 en el centro de detención de GEO en Aurora esta tarde. ¡Hay 19 casos positivos confirmados! Sabemos que no podemos contar con GEO para mantener seguros a los miembros de nuestra comunidad que están detenidos. Exigimos que GEO libere a la mayor cantidad posible de personas en libertad condicional humanitaria y garantice que los enfermos reciban la atención médica adecuada. Seguiremos al tanto de la situación y nos conectaremos con las personas dentro de las instalaciones para garantizar su salud y seguridad.

Lea nuestro comunicado de prensa completo aquí: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: "Community showed up on Tuesday afternoon in LoDo to make sure Palantir Tech feels unwelcome in Denver....
item.content:encoded:
"Community showed up on Tuesday afternoon in LoDo to make sure Palantir Tech feels unwelcome in Denver.

Palantir Technologies is ICE’s technology backbone, provides the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants."

Photos by @buffalo_heart_images
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with...
item.content:encoded: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with difficulties accessing medication and sanitary products, serious COVID risks, abuse from guards, and intense stress from isolation (23+ hours a day). Their civil rights are also being violated with Denver, Adams and Arapahoe County working together to deny our comrades a bond hearing. Our comrades suffer yet they are still thinking of others — constantly telling communjty about the conditions of their cell mates and others in the jail and agitating for their release as well. @justiceforelijahmcclain PSL Denver and Say Their Names 5280 are heroes and freedom fighters. And we need to be fighting harder than ever for them. See you Saturday!
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver
